and exciting opportunity.

International
Networks

How We Meet Your Needs

We’ve separated our services to individually address the goals of each client and candidate. At My Job Tank, we focus on four lines of business in order to identify, target, and meet the needs of our clients with accuracy and efficiency.

    • Campus Recruiting Solutions

    My Job Tank is committed to the development of STEM students, with a network that includes more than 50 top-tier universities and a talent pool that covers over 10,000 bilingual Masters/MBA/PhD students in the US. We are proud to offer programs to our Clients that highlight the skills of recently graduated students from around the world, individuals who have both strong academic backgrounds and professional industry experience.

    So, How Does Your Resume Stack Up?

    Let Insty Match show you. In Seconds.

    Curious about your competition?

    Our Insty Match app shows how your resume compares against others competing for that juicy gig - in literally seconds. Tell us what position you’re considering, upload your resume and see where you stand in the rankings amongst the others in our database who are vying for a similar position.

    Employers, Meet Your Match.

    As a leader of technology initiatives, your projects and outcomes are critically dependent on accessing and having highly-skilled players on your team.

    MJT is well-placed to harness highly competitive and elusive talent markets in the most important tech hubs in the US and in China

    Using our proprietary AI/ML platform, we deliver efficient, speedy matching results and customized solutions to address your specific business issues.

    Insty-Match:
    your unbiased candidate rating system.

    Super fast and free.

    Seeking an impartial ranking of your candidate lineup?

    Let Insty-Match show how your candidates stack up - in literally a few seconds. Upload up to ten resumes, click submit and you’ll see how each one ranks in terms of qualification, experience and suitability for the job. Or pit a single resume against up to the top ten in our extensive database who would be vying for a similar position. Upload up to ten scoring requests per day.

    Try Insty-Match

    My Job Tank is a technology-driven human capital resource specializing in high-skilled technical talent solutions. MJT offers strategic partnerships with dynamic companies, leveraging an innovative AI platform that offers fast, efficient talent matching paired with exceptional personalized service. Our specialist teams in San Francisco, New York City, Seattle, and Shanghai deliver results as we delight today's fast-moving organizations and highly skilled talent with advanced strategies on an international scale.
